subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Swimming
lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps, the two-time defending champion in the 400-meter individual medley, finished fourth. His United States teammate Ryan Lochte won by nearly four seconds.
snippet: Michael Phelps, the two-time defending champion in the 400-meter individual medley, finished fourth. His United States teammate Ryan Lochte won by nearly four seconds.
